name: Antipsychotic
description:
The artistic installation Antipsychotic comes to PC. Dive into a fifteen minute journey through the mind of someone with bipolar disorder. This immersive experience marries poetic reflections and personal narratives with captivating audio-reactive visuals and evocative soundscapes, set to the beat of poignant music.

Explore each area of this world to uncover unique tracks from Antipsychotic's musical album. This experience utilizes a detailed sound system that delivers Antipsychotic's music in fully spatialized audio. Walk through songs and listen to their different sections. A spatialized audio narrative whisks you away from the soundscape to deliver poetic messages. Engage with audio reactive visuals, each with their own unique style. Headphones are recommended.

Antipsychotic is about exploring the nuanced challenges of mental health. Through its visuals and music, it aims to destigmatize mental illness and open up conversations about mental health. Antipsychotic's goal is to help others feel less alone.
